Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: nice size. purchased on thanksgiving and got a great price.
Cons: Cant take out battery
My son has totally enjoyed this tablet. He uses it on a daily bases and find it has what he was looking for in a tablet. I bought this for him for Christmas and it was easy to set up.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
Cons: the speakers arent loud, but with earphones thats not a problem
This tablet is simply amazing! and for the price you couldn't go wrong. the user interface is smooth and very easy to use, i am mainly an apple geek, but this tablet made good competition with the ipad in my eyes. many other reviews say that the dell streak is a horrible tablet but i guess they just haven't used it to its fullest! its a very good device and it fits in my back pocket very nicely. i would definitely recommend it.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing is good about this product
Cons: Everything
I bought three of these for my three kids and wow what a waste of money. The battery life is horrible. The design of the plug in to charge the tablet is the worst design I have ever seen. The tablet is set up to break. After dealing with all three of the tablets freezing up and locking them the battery drains in two hours. The screen quality has no quality at all. Save yourself the time and headache buy something else. What a dissapointment from Dell.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: It is just the right size for most applications
Cons: Dell quit selling it so accessories are limited
Works well. Great for checking email and playing games. My grandson has one too, he uses it for games of course and education apps. So easy to use a five year old can master it quicker than I did!! Great product, only wish Dell had not stopped selling it.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Not as easy to use as an iPad
Item.Review:
Pros: A nice compact size.
Cons: Old, unfriendly operating system.
There is nothing great about this pad, but it works. Not as easy to use as an iPad, so the learning curve will be much longer.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Great price for the features
Cons: Battery life is way too short
It works fine and functions well, but the battery life is very short. It only runs for a couple of hours if unplugged, which would not work well if taking it out and about. I suppose the battery would last longer if the wifi were turned off.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice size screen. Not too small and not too large like ipad.
Cons: Not so easy to find a cover that closes and opens up to protect it when younger ones are using it.
We bought two for our girls for Christmas. They have used them for games in the car while traveling and also as part of their homeschool programs. They loved playing with our iphones,but now have their own gadgets. The only down side is that they frequently attempt to purchase apps, unknowingly, I wish there were more of a security password type app purchase process out there, but, that being said....the product has been great. Camera, video, are both clear. It charges well and lasts for a long period of time. We are very happy with our purchase. The educational apps out today are great for my elementary gi ... rls and this product is a perfect size for them to hold really well while working them. So far, it has worked great with all apps. No problems at all. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Not even worth the price the day-after-Thankgiving. Heavy, cumbersome, slow. Small computer, but not really portable: Amost no battery. Must keep it plugged in most of the time. Screen not significantly better than my smart-phone.
Main problem: iPad. Wouldn't pay for an iPad, and shouldn't have paid for this. Just too far below the iPad standard.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice tablet for the one day it actually worked; got it for good price on thanksgiving deal.
Cons: Malfunctioned 2nd day; really short battery life.
This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. All she wanted was a Kindle, s we were excited to get her a full tablet instead. She was so happy Christmas day and then the next day it stopped working. Wouldn't boot past the Dell logo. Then I learned Dell discontinued this item about a week after I bought hers. After a frustrating experience on hold with Dell for 40 minutes before even talking to someone , we took it back and got a Kindle Fire instead. Much better.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: nothing
Cons: doesn't work
I stayed up all night/morning Thanksgiving day waiting on Best Buy to release there sales. Finally around 6am they are released and I bought the Dell Streak for $159. It was for my step daughter who opened it up on Christmas and was soon completely devistated. Within two days it would not turn on and once we got it on it would freeze and the screen would go off. I tried to exchange it but Best Buy said they no longer sell the item but had another Dell Streak (same size) and I would have to pay the difference!!! It was $300, the "original" price of the one I bought! The only other option was to return it to Dell and have them fix it. After researching online I seen that Dell had discountinued it after having so many issues with them. I decided ... to return the tablet but could only get the $159 from Best Buy and they refused work with me under the circumstances to give my any kind of deal on another tablet. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Android 3.2 honeycomb, small compact, low price
Cons: Freeze up, few accesssories compatible, propiertary charge cable
Before my purchase of 2 Streak 7 tablets I never heard of this tablet. I did quick customer review search and risk 50% reviews stating battery or related issues with it not turning on. Being it was gift for 2 non technical users, this was a good beginner tablet. Within a week it power screen saver (when it goes black) on both tablets would not turn back on. After discharging battery for few hours, recharge it and it work fine. After extending screen saver time, it would still happen about every 3-4 weeks. The best way to avoid is shut it down if not in use for more than 10 min. Other than that, Android 3.2 works great, fast response, multitouch works ... . Bluetooth logitech keyboard (i'm using now) works great. Android market and gmail apps work great. Only 1 time a update to facebook app made it not work. After uninstalling updates it worked again. Only wish it came with a longer wall charger. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: software package
Cons: battery life
I bought this as a discontinued and returned item. So far it has done everything that I wanted and pretty well. My only complaint is the short battery life.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review: I purchased this item primarily for my 7 y/o 2nd grader because the branded educational toys were too limiting. There are many apps on Android geared towards kids education, and others that broaden his approach to learning. Responds quickly to touch and is a good size for smaller hands. It's a good buy for the kids and a good tool for parents too. Definitely worth it.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Great tablet with Honeycomb for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Price and 7" screen
Cons: Product has been discontinued :(
I have found the tablet very functional. Was looking for an android tablet for under $200. This one functions very well. I haven't found any apps that down work on it. Very pleased, only disappointment is that I hear it has already been discontinued. That is a shame, as I have recommended it to many of my friends.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Very compact, easy to navigate
Cons: It seems to be a complete piece of junk
The streak worked pretty good for the first couple of days and then started experiencing delay issues and automatic shut downs. I kept it because it was a very good deal and thought I could work through those issues. However, after just under a month of use, the thing locked up and never re-started. I returned it to Best Buy for a complete refund. I would not recommend this product to anyone else.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: Short battery life; tends to freeze
Initially thought the tablet would be nice since it did the basic functions that I wanted. However, the continual battery problems (not lasting very long after being fully charged and often freezing when I turned it on after charging it) made the tablet very unattractive for me so I had to return it.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: I got it for good price..170$
This tablet is good to use... But sometimes it freezes without reason... It automatically switched OFF,then later 2 days we were able to switch it ON..........

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Screen size. The idea of it.
Cons: It doesn't work.
It will be fully charged lights lit, and the screen is black. It won't do anything. You can't use it and you can't shut it off. My favorite part is that the little "manual" they send with it states if you have any issues check the Owner's Manual stored on the tablet. Well, how does one recommend doing that when you can't even get into it. We will be taking it back to have it fixed/replaced/money refunded.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Product for the price
Cons: Software glitches make it necessary to reset it often.
I would Give it 5 Stars however, once in a while I have to hit the reset button as it seems to lock. Other than that it is a great tablet

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Got it at half price which is very reasonable for the brand.
I bought this for my 6 year old for Christmas and he loves it. Can't keep him off of it. No problems so far so good.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: It was 7 inches.
Cons: The battery life
The battery life is way to short 3 hours. The screen is horrible the looks like dots per inche. I return it and got the Asus it's Awsome. This tablet should be $89.99.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Its compact size
Cons: can't think of anything
I bought this tablet as a "door buster" special for my son, who is 12. He has been asking for a tablet for quite a while and we have not been able to afford one. This one was inexpensive compared to others, about $160.00. It makes his happy and was a perfect Christmas present. He says that it is quite fast, can hold all the apps he wants, retains charge well, and is very reliable. He has used his friends' apple ipads and he says that the dell streak is just as good.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review: This tablet is great for the price. You can't beat the price for the amount of good things you are getting with this tablet. The only thing that I dislike but its not that bad is the screen it could be improved but overall it is very good. I would recommed this to a lot of people.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Bad Device, bad service reps - User Buyer Beware!
Item.Review:
Pros: is to cause nervousness of losing important data when the device is suddenly dead
Cons: reliability.
Bought a brand new Steak 7 from BB in early Dec11. The device was working OK for 3 weeks, then suddenly dead (black screen and couldn't boot up). Called Dell rep, and one said it was out of battery ( wasn't out of battery before it went dead in the first place with). Dell rep said: would call back after 2 hours while charging the battery and to continue with trouble shooting. No call back, and the device still couldn't boot up (not battery!) I called again the day after, different rep attempted to help by provide direction for hard reset. Device didn't respond to anything. So, they issued a return for repair. After sending back the device, Dell sent a different refurbish ... ed device for replacement. Took about 7 days. The refurbished replacement device is working, but the battery doesn't seem to hold charge well (overnight charging of 7 hours can only charge up to 96% and that is not from 0% as I don't wait til drained out to charge) and often cause trouble with boot up. Dell reps are not that knowledgeable to say it politely. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Good size. The os system is quick enough for me(3.2)
Cons: unreliable.Scared that it will continually crash.So,so res.
It does do everything it should do for a tablet. I do wish it had better resolution. 480p in this day and age is totally outdated, and I can't imagine it costing much more to make it better. It did crash on me like so many others(where all you could get was the dell logo flashing over and over).Was going to take it back until I found out it was to late.I was about ready to send it off to Dell, and decided to check their website about the issue. Someone on their forum suggested to reset it( open up the panel where the sd card goes, press the reset button with a pin, then hold down the power button and the + volume buttom at the same time. Wait a few seco ... nds and scroll down to factory reset). Did this and it has been working well ever since. Luckily I didn't have any paid apps on it and could put them back on easily. If I did have some paid apps though, I would have been upset.Now I'm scared that it will crash again, and will only put free apps on it , which is ridiculous. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything but the screen.
Cons: The screen.
I really wanted to love this tablet - aside from the screen, it was better than the Acer Iconia 7" on paper and cheaper. However, the screen is terrible. Just terrible. I had to return it - couldn't read e-mails or surf the web without it hurting my eyes/head.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Fits right in my purse.
Cons: The only thing I don't love about it is that i have to do a hard reset once or twice a week.
The only thing I don't love about it is that i have to do a hard reset once or twice a week. If I hadn't bought this on black Friday when it was deeply discounted I would have demanded a refund.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: price for performance
Cons: the occasional lock up
I got this tablet on the Black Friday sales for a great price. It was delivered quickly given all the BF sales on the web. Works great right out of the box with enough apps to get started. It has the Android Market for everything else. It comes with plenty of memory, reasonable speed and the resolution is fine. The only problem is that it will lock up once in a while but it is easy to reset and nothing appears to be lost.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Android Honeycomb, Dual Core Tegra 2, Great Price
Cons: For the price nothing!
When you are buying electronics you have to know what you want, and how much it cost (not how much you want to spend). If what you want cost too much for you, keep on waiting because you'll come out with something you don't like.
The Dell Streak is hands down the best tablet for it's price range SUB 200. You get many of the same features as high end tablets, at a very reasonable price without a contract. If you do research, you'll see how great this little thing is for the price!

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Great value and easy to use
Cons: Battery
An iPad is an iPad. None of the other tablets are. However, the Dell Streak is a very strong android tablet. We bought 3 for our kids at Christmas(7yr-14yrs) an they couldn't be happier. Does absolutely everything that a $800 iPad does. The only slightly negative thing is the battery life. Just plug it up!

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: price at time of purchase
Cons: battery, screen
Price was very reasonable but the unit's screen resolution was not satisfactory nor was the battery life. Unit was returned.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Power could not turn on in less than 1 month
Item.Review:
Pros: If it works, it can do a lots
Cons: doesn't work
I ordered this online. After I received it for less than 1 month, I could not turn on the power nor charge it. I returned it.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, Size
Cons: battery life, internal storage
I scored this tablet at a great price. It is well worth what I paid for it. My only complaint is that you can't move apps to the external SD card. I have a lot of information and apps stored and this hasn't became a problem. The battery life is minimal but sufficient for what I need it for.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: It was cheap and now I know why
Cons: Cheap, poor microphone recording, freezes up
Opened on Christmas day and after charging the device would not even turn on. Called Dell support and they walked me through 2 different resets on the device and nothing worked. Sent it for repair and Dell sent a different device that had Gingerbread OS instead of Honeycomb! I don't understand Dell having such a poor product and support. Finally got it upgraded to Honeycomb and now have discovered that the microphone is terrible. The recording is not even mediocre but completely disappointing.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Loved it until it wouldn't charge.
Item.Review:
Pros: Android OS and Camera
Cons: Defective Unit received and item is no longer available
Loved using it the first day and then attempted to charge it and it would not charge. Brought it to best buy and they did not have any more. Had to trade for the kindle fire. Kindle fire does not have a camera which is severely missed. I bought the dell streak for my daughter so she could video skype with her grandmother in florida. I would have traded for another tablet with a camera but the cost difference was to much for me to afford. I had bought the dell streak during the thanksgiving specials. I just wish I was able to replace my defective dell streak for another one.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact, Powerful, Full Featured, Great Price
Cons: Not so great battery life
I picked this up as a Christmas gift for my son on Black Friday ($160). He's in his early teens and has nearly destroyed his cell phone and an Xbox, so I wasn't about to drop 500.00 on something that might not make it til next Christmas. So far we have been very happy with the purchase. It does every thing you would expect it to do with ease. We've watched videos and played around with apps for the most part. I've used it as an e-reader but it's not really suited to that purpose because of a fairly short battery life. (3 hours and 45 minutes on average) Now that the Kindle is out, there are some very good options around the 200.00 range but I feel that we got a very good product at a great pri ... ce. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Great tablet...sorry to see it discontinued
Item.Review:
Pros: Reasonably priced, standard Android 3.2
Cons: Battery life could be better.
I got the Dell Streak 7 on black friday for my 5 year old son. It's a great tablet running Honeycomb (Android 3.2). My son loves it as does his parents.
I don't understand at all why Dell discontinued it. The 7" screen size is better for my son than the 10" sized tablets. Also, the $159 pricing was reasonable.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice size
Cons: Buggy
I used the Streak for about a week, before my frustration got the best of me & I ended returning it.
The main bugs was if it went to sleep while I was using an app, I had to do a hard reset (paperclip into a reset hole) to get it started again. I could almost live with that, but on the 7th day, a recurring error message kept on popping up. When researching the the message, I found many had the same problem going back months, but I could not find a fix put out by Dell, just suggestions by other users. I figured if Dell wasn't supporting their product, neither should I.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: No wonder it is called streak
Item.Review: Got it on sale during black friday as a present for my wife. Good thing i tried it out before wrapping it. Half of the screen Is unusable. Like there are streaks all over half of the screen. Returned it the following day. No option to replace because bestbuy no longer sells it at the time i returned it.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: Did not work.
The tablet arrived with a row of broken pixels. When I initially opened the box, I was surprised to find the screen essentially pressed up against the top with no padding or protection. I returned it directly to a Best Buy and they were unable to find a replacement or provide a comparable device.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and easy to carry!
Cons: Battery life, proprietary charging Cord!! (no big deal, Apple has it too)
It has the Dual Core Nvidia! has Android 3.2! Has Expandable memory and great for Wifi browsing and APPs and Games!! Runs Smooth like fluid! Its pretty much like a Mini Motorola Xoom! I tried both and decided to buy this one on Black Friday deal for $199 ! thats a Steal!

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Cons: Display, slow
I had this tablet for 2 days and had to return it. It rebooted itself 3 times and it had issue running Amazon app store.
The display is really bad.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: so far seems easy to operate
Item.Review:
Pros: easy to maneuver
Cons: battery adn bigger screen
Want to go watch a U Tube video and will learn more.. but so far seems easy.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review: battery life not that good, but clear picture and good responce

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: Its not an iPad
It's ok. Not as fast or as responsive as my iPad. Battery only lasts about four hours. The only plus is the camera.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review: easy to use and does everthing i need. fast and great for games...tons of apps that are available

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: Stopped working in less than 3 days
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
Cons: Did not work.
Slow to start up. Stopped charging in three days. Returned to store and bought a Nook tablet...

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review: This tablet it great! My son loves it and plays on it all the time. You can download virtually any app in the market.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.ReviewTitle: The worst thing I have ever bought.
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Everything
I will never purchase a Dell product again. I purchased two tablets and they both stopped working on the second day.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up
great shape. very satisfied with it. working well so far.

Item.Item: Dell Streak 7 Tablet with 16GB Memory - Black
Item.Review: its got intense graphics and a clear screen. it has been rated high by other users and i recomend this at this price.
